<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <!-- Title text -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/titleText"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Vehicle Parking Registration"
        android:textSize="20sp"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/vehicleTypeSpinner"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

    <!-- Spinner for vehicle type -->
    <Spinner
        android:id="@+id/vehicleTypeSpinner"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:entries="@array/vehicle_types"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/titleText"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />

    <!-- EditText for vehicle number -->
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/vehicleNumberEditText"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="Enter Vehicle Number"
        android:inputType="text"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/vehicleTypeSpinner"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"/>

    <!-- EditText for RC number -->
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/rcNumberEditText"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="Enter RC Number"
        android:inputType="text"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/vehicleNumberEditText"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"/>

    <!-- Submit Button -->
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/submitButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Submit"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/rcNumberEditText"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"/>

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">

    <!-- Title -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/confirmationTitle"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Confirm Vehicle Details"
        android:textSize="20sp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"/>

    <!-- Display Vehicle Type -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/vehicleTypeTextView"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
        android:text="Vehicle Type:"
        android:textSize="16sp"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/confirmationTitle" />

    <!-- Display Vehicle Number -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/vehicleNumberTextView"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Vehicle Number:"
        android:textSize="16sp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/vehicleTypeTextView"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginTop="10dp"/>

    <!-- Display RC Number -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/rcNumberTextView"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="RC Number:"
        android:textSize="16sp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/vehicleNumberTextView"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginTop="10dp"/>

    <!-- Confirm Button -->

    <!-- Edit Button -->
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/confirmButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginStart="64dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
        android:text="Confirm"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/rcNumberTextView" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/editButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="64dp"
        android:text="Edit"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/rcNumberTextView" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
